bibl.title: The Origin and Value of the Theramenes Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Mich Inv. 5982 [ed.: Herbert C. Youtie und Reinhold Merkelbach, ZPE 2 (1968) pp. 161-169 et pl. III]. - Nature du texte et attribution à Hermippos de Smyrne. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 60 (1989) No. 2221.
bibl.seg: Pesely George E., The Origin and Value of the Theramenes Papyrus.
